common.browser-not-supported: It seems your browser is not supported. Some of the features may not work.

status-message.default-message_warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
status-message.default-message_info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that

validation.failed: Please fill out all the fields before continuing
validation.field-error_email: This field should be a valid email
validation.field-error_seed: This field should be a valid secret seed
validation.field-error_validateUrl: This field should be a valid website URL
validation.field-error_documentContainer: This field should contain a document
validation.field-error_integer: This field should be a valid integer
validation.field-error_minValue: This field should be more or equal {{minValue, number}}
validation.field-error_requiredAtLeastOne: Choose at least one of the options
validation.field-error_amount: Amount must be a number, greater than {{ minValue, number }}
validation.field-error_maxValue: Value should be less than {{maxValue, number}}
validation.field-error_decimal: Allowed integer or decimal numbers only
validation.field-error_amountRange: Amount should be in the range from {{from, money}} to {{to, money}}
validation.field-error_minDate: Date should be after {{ minDate, date }}
validation.field-error_maxDate: Date should be before {{ maxDate, date }}
validation.field-error_emailOrAccountId: This field should be a valid email or account ID
validation.field-error_accountId: This field should be a valid account ID
validation.field-error_maxDecimalPoints: Only {{quantity}} digits after point are allowed
validation.field-error_noMoreThanAvailableForIssuan: Insufficient available for issuance amount. You have {{available, number}}
validation.field-error_address: Make sure the address is correct
validation.field-error_maxLength: This field must contain maximum {{length}} symbols
validation.field-error_maxDecimalDigitsCount: This field cannot contain more than {{maxDecimalDigitsCount}} decimal digits
validation.field-error_ibanValidator: Make sure the IBAN is correct
validation.field-error_cardNumber: Make sure the card number is correct
validation.field-error_cardExpirationDate: Make sure the expiration date is correct
validation.field-error_cardCVV3: Make sure the CVV3 is correct
validation.field-error_bankBIC: Make sure the BIC/SWIFT code is correct
validation.field-error_softCapMoreThanHardCap: Soft cap should be between zero and "Hard cap" value. Hard cap: {{hardCap, number}}
validation.field-error_hardCapLessThanSoftCap: Hard cap cannot be less than "Soft cap" value. Soft cap: {{softCap, number}}
validation.field-error_noMoreThanSaleCap: Investing amount has exceeded the sale cap {{saleCap, money}}
validation.field-error_assetCode: Asset code must contain maximum 16 symbols and consist of alphanumeric values (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
validation.field-error_alphaNum: Value should consists of alphanumeric values (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
validation.field-error_minLength: This field must contain minimum {{minLength}} symbols
validation.field-error_selectedSameAssetCode: Not allowed duplicated quote asset codes
validation.field-error_validatePhoneNumber: Make sure the phone number is correct
validation.field-error_emailOrPhoneNumber: This field should be a valid email or phone number
validation.field-error_telegramUsername: Make sure the telegram username is correct

errors.default: Something bad happened. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.server: This service is temporary unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Timeout exceeded. Please re-check your internet connection and try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please re-check your internet connection and try again.
errors.internal: Something bad happened. Please try again later or contact the system owner.
errors.bad-request: The request you sent is invalid in some way.
errors.not-allowed: Your account don't have permissions to perform this request.
errors.user-exists: User with such email already exists.
errors.transaction: The transaction you sent is invalid.
errors.user-doesnt-exist: This user doesn't exist in system.
errors.balance-not-found: The user does not have this asset balance yet.
errors.file-upload: Cannot upload a file to the storage. Please upload another file or try again later.

supported-browsers.title: Browsers that support all of our features
supported-browsers.description: Looks like your current browser cannot support some of our features. You need to update your current browser or download browser that supports all of our features by following links below.

transaction-errors.tx_insufficient_fee: The total fee amount is greater than the max fee amount specified by tx source
transaction-errors.tx_source_underfunded: Not enough funds for tx fee
transaction-errors.tx_commission_line_full: Charging tx fee would cause uint64 overflow
transaction-errors.tx_fee_incorrect_precision: Cannot charge the fee for the transaction. The fee is charged with a non-divisible asset, and the total calculated amount of the fee would cause this asset to split
transaction-errors.tx_no_role_permission: Source account does not have rule which allows him send transaction, or such rule forbid to do this
transaction-errors.op_bad_auth: You don’t have permission to complete this action
transaction-errors.op_no_entry: There is no entry which is tried to get by specified id in operation
transaction-errors.op_not_supported: Such operation currently is not supported
transaction-errors.op_account_blocked: Operations from blocked account are not allowed
transaction-errors.op_account_type_mismatched: Wrong account type in operation. Refresh page and try again
transaction-errors.op_invalid_destination: Source id matches with destination account id
transaction-errors.op_rule_is_used: Not allowed to remove rule which is used
transaction-errors.op_no_such_rule: There is no rule with such id
transaction-errors.op_default_rule_id_duplication: Not allowed to set default rule id, they will be set automatically
transaction-errors.op_invalid_weight: Weight must not be bigger than 1000
transaction-errors.op_no_signer_data: There must be at least one signer for new account
transaction-errors.op_role_is_used: Not allowed to remove role which is used
transaction-errors.op_rule_id_duplication: Not allowed to set equal rule ids
transaction-errors.op_range_overlap: Range you entered overlapped with another one. Delete or reduce an old one before creating new
transaction-errors.op_no_such_role: Creating account with not existing role not allowed
transaction-errors.op_invalid_signature: Signature does not correspond public key, which is allowed to perform such operations
transaction-errors.op_invalid_pre_issuer: New pre issuer public key is the same as existing
transaction-errors.op_balance_mismatch: Asset of balance and asset of operation are not equal
transaction-errors.op_request_already_exists: This request already exists in the system
transaction-errors.op_stats_asset_already_exists: It can be only one stats asset in the system
transaction-errors.op_line_full: Payment would cause a destination account to exceed their declared trust limit for the asset being sent
transaction-errors.op_balance_account_mismatched: Account id has no such balance
transaction-errors.op_balance_assets_mismatched: Asset of balance and asset of operation are not equal
transaction-errors.op_reference_duplication: You cannot make two issuances with the same reference
transaction-errors.op_limits_exceeded: The operation exceeds limits set to your account. Check "Limits" page for your current limits.
transaction-errors.op_not_allowed_by_asset_policy: This action is not allowed by asset policy
transaction-errors.op_underfunded: Not enough funds. Reduce the amount and try again
transaction-errors.op_cross_self: Current order crosses your existing order
transaction-errors.op_physical_price_restriction: Price cannot be lower than physical
transaction-errors.op_current_price_restriction: Price cannot be lower than current
transaction-errors.op_malformed: Operation you are trying to create is malformed in some way
transaction-errors.op_can_not_delete_in_progress: Cannot delete request while it is progress
transaction-errors.op_asset_is_not_withdrawable: It is not allowed to withdraw specified asset
transaction-errors.op_converted_amount_mismatched: Specified converted amount does not match calculated
transaction-errors.op_balance_lock_overflow: Too much assets are locked in specified balance

transaction-errors.op_base_asset_or_asset_request_not_found: Asset of asset creation request for base asset not found
transaction-errors.op_quote_asset_not_found: Quote asset does not exists or there is no asset pair with quote asset and default quote asset
transaction-errors.op_start_end_invalid: Sale should not end before start
transaction-errors.op_invalid_end: Trying to create sale which already ended
transaction-errors.op_invalid_cap: Soft cap should not exceed Hard cap
transaction-errors.op_insufficient_max_issuance: Asset’s max issuance amount is insufficient to fulfill soft cap
transaction-errors.op_invalid_asset_pair: One of the assets (base or quote) has invalid code or they are equal
transaction-errors.op_request_or_sale_already_exists: Sale creation request or sale already exists for specified asset
transaction-errors.op_not_authorized: Account not authorized to perform issuance of the asset
transaction-errors.op_exceeds_max_issuance_amount: Maximal issuance amount will be exceeded after issuance
transaction-errors.op_receiver_full_line: Total funds of receiver will exceed UINT64_MAX after issuance
transaction-errors.op_fee_exceeds_amount: Fee is more than amount to issue

transaction-errors.op_order_book_does_not_exists: Specified sale does not exists or already closed

transaction-errors.op_order_violates_hard_cap: Offer violates hard cap restriction of the sale

transaction-errors.op_not_verified_cannot_have_policies: Not verified account can not have policies

transaction-errors.op_invalid_reason: Reason (CreatorDetails) must be empty if approving and not empty if rejecting
transaction-errors.op_reject_not_allowed: Reject not allowed, use permanent reject

idle-message.notification-message: You have been logged out due to long inactivity.

auth-pages.big-title:
Start tokenizing
your assets
in minutes
auth-pages.almost-done-details: A confirmation email was sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox to verify your account. If you didn't receive a confirmation email, check your spam folder.
auth-pages.recovery-email-link-sent-msg: The recovery link has been sent to your e-mail. Please, follow it to recover your account
auth-pages.recovered: Account recovered. You can now use the new credentials to sign in
auth-pages.email-requested: Email sent. Please check your inbox
auth-pages.save-recovery-seed-explanation:
Save this seed to a safe place and do not show it to anyone

 Seed is used to recover account in case of password loss. If you lose your password and seed, you will **never** access your account.

 **We do not know your seed** and it will never be shown again!
auth-pages.verifying-email-msg: Please wait while we verifying your email address.

security-page.secret-seed-desc: Secret seed is private information that proves you own your account.
security-page.network-passphrase-desc: Network passphrase is a sequence of words or other text used to control access to a system

telegram-form.info-msg: Go to this chat to get an authorization code

tfa-form.qr-desc: Scan the QR with your 2FA app. We recommend Google Authenticator for most users. It doesn’t require an internet connection or phone service to use, and is more secure than SMS due to being offline and local to your device.
tfa-form.secret-code-desc: Or manually set the secret code
tfa-form.tfa-code-desc: And enter your 2FA code to continue

verification-page.loading-error-msg: There was an error while loading.

verification-page.account-type-corporate-description: Deposit, withdraw, buy, sell, transfer and create assets

verification-state-message.blocked-desc: Your verification request was blocked by administrator.
verification-state-message.reset-desc: Your verification request was reset by administrator. Please, verify your account again.
verification-state-message.approved-desc: Your account was approved by administrator. Now you can access all the features requiring verification.
verification-state-message.pending-desc: Your verification request is being processed. You will be able to update details once the request is reviewed.
verification-state-message.rejected-desc: Your verification request was rejected by administrator. Please, resolve all the issues and send the request again.
verification-state-message.permanently-rejected-desc: Your verification request was permanently rejected by administrator. Please, send the request again.
verification-state-message.additional-info-title: Additional information (provided by admin or KYC service):

kyc-recovery-state-message.approved-desc: Your KYC recovery request was approved by administrator. Now you can access all the features.
kyc-recovery-state-message.pending-desc: Your KYC recovery request is being processed. You will be able access all the features once the request is reviewed.
kyc-recovery-state-message.rejected-desc: Your KYC recovery request was rejected by administrator. Please, resolve all the issues and send the request again.
kyc-recovery-state-message.permanently-rejected-desc: Your KYC recovery request was permanently rejected by administrator.

downloads-page.title: Downloads
downloads-page.mobile-apps-header: All your assets right on your phone
downloads-page.mobile-apps-desc: To access your assets everywhere, get the Conto app on your mobile device.
downloads-page.pre-issuance-apps-desc: To pre authorize your assets to be issued, get the Offline Device Pre-issuance tool on your computer.

ios-installation-guide.title: iOS installation guide
ios-installation-guide.how-to-install-header: How to install Conto wallet app on iOS
ios-installation-guide.apple-policy-desc: Unfortunately, Apple AppStore has a strict and unreliable policy regarding cryptocurrency-related apps. Because of this, we are unable to provide stable application updates through AppStore.
ios-installation-guide.steps-desc: In order to install Conto iOS wallet app follow the next steps:
ios-installation-guide.install-step: Close browser and wait until the app is downloaded and installed.
ios-installation-guide.first-launch-step: On the first attempt to launch the app, you will see a message show on the first image below. Close that dialog and perform next steps (illustrated below for iOS 12). Please make sure you’re connected to the internet.

mass-issuance-form.how-to-receivers-paragraph: List all receivers emails in the box below. Each receiver will gain the amount you specified in the “Amount” field. If the available amount is insufficient the operation will fail and no asset will be issued to anyone. Not found users and the ones that do not have balance in the selected asset will not receive the issuance but all the others will. Receivers number is limited up to 100 for now.
mass-issuance-form.no-assets-msg-description: Unfortunately, you do not have any assets now, please create an asset and try again.
mass-issuance-form.no-receivers-found: Receivers you provided not found or cannot receive the issuance. Please ensure you specified the valid receivers list and try again.
mass-issuance-form.overissue-error-notif: The total amount is bigger than the available for issuance amount. Please decrease the amount to issue and try again.
mass-issuance-form.too-much-op-error-notif: Too many receivers, the current limit is 100 receivers, please decrease the receivers count and try again.

mass-payment-form.how-to-receivers-paragraph: List all receivers emails in the box below. Each receiver will gain the amount you specified in the “Amount” field. If the available amount is insufficient the operation will fail and no asset will be issued to anyone. Not found users and the ones that do not have balance in the selected asset will not receive the issuance but all the others will. Receivers number is limited up to 100 for now.
mass-payment-form.no-assets-msg-description: Unfortunately, you do not have any assets now, please create an asset and try again.
mass-payment-form.no-receivers-found: Receivers you provided not found or cannot receive the send. Please ensure you specified the valid receivers list and try again.
mass-payment-form.overpayment-error-notif: The total amount is bigger than the available for send amount. Please decrease the amount to send and try again.
mass-payment-form.too-much-op-error-notif: Too many receivers, the current limit is 100 receivers, please decrease the receivers count and try again.

mass-invitation-form.how-to-invitees-paragraph: List all invitees emails in the box below.
mass-invitation-form.no-invitees-found: Receivers you provided not found or cannot receive the invitation. Please ensure you specified the valid receivers list and try again.

customers-table.no-data-msg: You have no associated customers yet. Invite some and they will appear in this list.
customers-table.error-msg: An error occurred while loading the list, please contact system owner to resolve the issue.
